channel.title: Project Crimson[533]
channel.description:
[FONT="Palatino Linotype"][center]
[img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/9746/crimsonlogo.png[/img]
Welcome to our [color=#1dc7ff]Project Crimson 533[/color] thread. This project is aimed at writing a well programmed server with alot of ingame features to release to play for public eventually. The server is based on a 533 client that uses a 534 cache.
We are programming the server with [color=#1dc7ff]three[/color] people: [color=#1dc7ff]Ethanofenjd(killer75230), Virus X3[/color] and myself [color=#1dc7ff]Maxi[/color]. We will not take more people into the project as with three people we can handle and exchange our updates easily enough. Every person involved in this project does approximately the same amount of work and we all put our real life on the first place. We aim to eventually release the client to the public to play on. Anyone that asks for our server source will get his post removed.
[size=3][color=#1dc7ff]Ingame features.[/color][/size]
[b]Current features are:[/b]
~ All player update masks fully working ~ Multiplayer. ~ Equiping and unequiping ~ All item related packets ~ All player options related packets ~ Teleporting ~ Global objects ~ NPC's ~ Dialogues ~ Private messaging ~ Clan chat ~ Projectiles ~ Hinticons ~ Sounds ~ Skill levels ~ Working assisting ~ Player versus Player combat base ~ Working firemaking + fire deletion ~ 100% trading ~ Fully working magic ~ Fully working magic on items ~ Perfect interfaces and dialogues with heads and items ~ Perfect following
[b]Skills[/b]
~ Firemaking ~ Smithing (only smithing bars so far) ~ Fishing ~ Fletching ~ Cooking ~ Magic (i.e. Alchemy spells)
[b]Features being worked on right now:[/b]
~ Smithing base ~ Blending all kinds of combat into one perfect system ~ Serverside route finding ~ Banking ~ Client GUI for admins and normal players
[b]Features that will be written:[/b]
~ Duelling ~ Quests ~ A story-line ~ Atleast 12 different skills ~ Clan Wars ~ Other things that come down the line
So far this project is still developing [color=#1dc7ff]rapidly[/color]. We are currently also working on a custom [color=#1dc7ff]world loading list[/color]. We will aim to add things as accurate as we can and we won't just make it a Player Kill server. Expect the server to be big and good once we release it to public players.
[size=3][color=#1dc7ff]Video's.[/color][/size]
Sweet following.
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=w7h6ds&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=w7h6ds&s=5[/url]
Smithing @ furnace.
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=1zvemxf&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=1zvemxf&s=5[/url]
100% trading.
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2pryziq&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2pryziq&s=5[/url]
Working bar smithing with the heat item spell.
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=333d6yo&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=333d6yo&s=5[/url]
Working magic on item, for example alchemy.
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2l25vp&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2l25vp&s=5[/url]
Perfect dark bow special.
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=x1yemf&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=x1yemf&s=5[/url]
[size=3][color=#1dc7ff]Pictures.[/color][/size] These pictures are not posted in any particular precedence.
Fully working masks.
[img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/2079/74200921457.png[/img]
Player combat.
[IMG]http://i133.photobucket.com/albums/q50/Maxman148/rangecombat.png[/img]
Firemaking + fire deletion.
[img]http://img147.imageshack.us/img147/6412/2832009114814.png[/img]
Equiping.
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/4t0to0.jpg[/img]
Item on interfaces.
[img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/527/174200911149.png[/img]
Hit update masks, both of them.
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2d19rae.jpg[/img]
Working GFX's and animations.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/303l0fr.png[/img]
NPC's.
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2cpfeh3.jpg[/img]
Multiplayer.
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/28wl7hy.jpg[/img]
Private messaging.
[img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/1704/wootk.png[/img]
Trading.
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2copj5e.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i133.photobucket.com/albums/q50/Maxman148/trading.png[/img]
Progress on banking.
[IMG]http://i133.photobucket.com/albums/q50/Maxman148/bankoptions.png[/img]
Clan chat.
[img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/2614/clanchat.png[/img]
Ground items.
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/1gj5gm.jpg[/img]
Strings on interfaces.
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/d3o.png[/img]
More to come soon. Check our [color=#1dc7ff]project thread[/color] once in a time, we work on it daily and are progressing fast. We will add more pictures, we have to update/upload them.
[/FONT][/center]
I am updating this thread after months of no activity.

item.title: Project Crimson[533]
item.dc:creator: @maxzzz maxzzz
item.description:
@maxzzz wrote:

We got to decide which one stays ;)… Some stupid moderator thinks he has to tell me I can’t post multiple threads, I lolled.
Anyways, if you want to maintain this thread Ethan, be my guest we will just have to remove the other one by request then.

Oh and remove the font, moparscape doesn’t support it :(.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Crimson[533]
item.dc:creator: @killer75230 killer75230
item.description:
@killer75230 wrote:

[FONT=“Palatino Linotype”][center]

Welcome to our [color=#1dc7ff]Project Crimson 533[/color] thread. This project is aimed at writing a well programmed server
with alot of ingame features to release to play for public eventually. The server is based on a 533 client that uses a 534 cache.

We are programming the server with [color=#1dc7ff]three[/color] people: [color=#1dc7ff]Ethanofenjd(killer75230), Virus X3[/color] and myself [color=#1dc7ff]Maxi[/color]. We will not take more people into the project
as with three people we can handle and exchange our updates easily enough.
Every person involved in this project does approximately the same amount of work and we all put our real life on the first place.
We aim to eventually release the client to the public to play on. Anyone that asks for our server source will get his post removed.

[size=3][color=#1dc7ff]Ingame features.[/color][/size]

Current features are:

~ All player update masks fully working
~ Multiplayer.
~ Equiping and unequiping
~ All item related packets
~ All player options related packets
~ Teleporting
~ Global objects
~ NPC’s
~ Dialogues
~ Private messaging
~ Clan chat
~ Projectiles
~ Hinticons
~ Sounds
~ Skill levels
~ Working assisting
~ Player versus Player combat base
~ Working firemaking + fire deletion
~ 100% trading
~ Fully working magic
~ Fully working magic on items
~ Perfect interfaces and dialogues with heads and items
~ Perfect following

Skills

~ Firemaking
~ Smithing (only smithing bars so far)
~ Fishing
~ Fletching
~ Cooking
~ Magic (i.e. Alchemy spells)

Features being worked on right now:

~ Smithing base
~ Blending all kinds of combat into one perfect system
~ Serverside route finding
~ Banking
~ Client GUI for admins and normal players

Features that will be written:

~ Duelling
~ Quests
~ A story-line
~ Atleast 12 different skills
~ Clan Wars
~ Other things that come down the line

So far this project is still developing [color=#1dc7ff]rapidly[/color]. We are currently also working on a custom [color=#1dc7ff]world loading list[/color].
We will aim to add things as accurate as we can and we won’t just make it a Player Kill server. Expect the server to
be big and good once we release it to public players.
